ussr.model
Class Actuator

java.lang.Object
  ussr.model.Entity
      ussr.model.Actuator

public class Actuator
extends Entity

An abstract actuator for a modular robot: can actuate two module components relative to each other. Has sensors to sense its state, and embeds its own controller.

Author:
david
